input: Retrieve the UUIDs of all prenote entries that have a planned validity end date in the next 30 days for the bank account with UUID 01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef.

output.sql: SELECT UUID FROM BankAccountPrenoteEntry WHERE BankAccountUUID = '01234567-89ab-cdef-0123-456789abcdef' AND PlannedValidityEndDate BETWEEN CURRENT_DATE AND CURRENT_DATE + INTERVAL '30 days';
